TrustedTypePolicyFactoryIsScriptURL.summary: The isScriptURL() method of the interface returns true if it is passed a valid object.

blockquote.para: Note: The purpose of the functions isScriptURL(), , and is to check if the object is a valid TrustedType object, created by a configured policy.

TrustedTypePolicyFactoryIsScriptURL.returns: A {{jsxref("boolean")}}that is true if the object is a valid object.
